string.text:
A strange backpack that emits energies similar to an anomaly field. It's textiles have been morphed by artifacts making it supernaturally heavy.
A scientist told you that using backpacks like this as stashes let's you see the same items inside, no matter where you are.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mysterious item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] item storage
 %c[0,100,255,150] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable as stash
You cannot sprint while carrying an Anomalous Backpack
This is the last Anomalous Stash. Remove its contents before you can pick it up!
